casebody.data:
Steven SEWELL
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided January 11, 2017

Michael J. Culkin, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jonathan M. Sousa, special deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The petitioner Steven Sewell's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 168 Conn. App. 735, 147 A.3d 196 (2016), is denied.
